sources.title: Masquerade (1965) Cliff Robertson Â· Jack Hawkins
sources.description: The British Secret Service has the underage heir to the throne of an oil sheikdom brought to safety from the regent's menacing intentions.. The conventional story serves as a hook for parodic spotlights on fashionable spy films, spiced with British self-irony..

metadata.Plot: The British secret service hire a WWII veteran to voluntarily kidnap and smuggle a 13-year-old Arab prince into Spain. Once there, a gullible American mercenary is hired to protect him, but greed threatens to spoil the operation.
metadata.Writer: Victor Canning, Michael Relph, William Goldman
metadata.Actors: Cliff Robertson, Jack Hawkins, Marisa Mell
